name: EduNiv
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my school
des:
Easy way to know details about your kid's daily activities with voice commands on your Alexa Devices.

With a simple voice command one can get the latest updates of School News, Messages, Daily Homework or Assignment, Pending Fee in words of your ward. It has the ability to informs the live location of your ward's School Bus. To enable this skill in Alexa devices, just use the voice command 

"Alexa, Open my school"
